author: cvuosalo
body:
A special geometry test is used by experts to compare geometry descriptions in different formats, e.g. in a local database and in the Conditions database. This PR enhances the output of this test. First, floating-point values close to zero are rounded to zero to prevent minor fluctuations of very tiny values from showing up as differences. Second, each line is labeled with a sub-detector name so it is easier to identify differences between two geometry descriptions.

Further improvements in this test might be desirable. It is still vulnerable to re-arrangements of identical descriptions.

This test is not used in production or in unit tests.

#### PR validation:

Test output is now somewhat easier to read.
title: Enhance formatting of special geometry test
